resources.string: Recently inaugrated world\'s tallest statue,the Statue of Unity is news trending.Let\'s play a quiz related with the world\'s tallest statue.
Q1. The Statue of Unity is dedicated to which leader ?
Q2. The Statue of Unity is located on island in river __________.
Q3. The Statue of Unity is located in which state ?
Q4. The leader is also known as ________ man of India.
Q5. This year(2018) was ____rd birth anniversary of the leader.
Q6. What is the height of the Statue of Unity ?
Q7. The statue is made up of -
Q8. Who is the designer of the Statue of Unity ?
Q9. When was the Statue of Unity inaugrated ?
Q10. Who inaugrated the Statue of Unity ?
